        <script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">

         function ValidateInputs(sender, args) {
             var phone = document.getElementById("ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder1_txtPhone").value;
             var email = document.getElementById("ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder1_txtEmail").value;
 
             if (phone === '' && email === '') {
                 args.IsValid = false;
             }
             else {
                 args.IsValid = true;
             }
         }
 
         function validateForm() {
             return Page_ClientValidate('');
         }
 
         $(document).ready(function () {
             document.forms[0].onsubmit = validateForm;
             $("[id*='cblOfficeLocations'] input:checked").click();
             toggleAboutUs(ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder1_rblCurrentPatient);
         });
         function toggleAboutUs(rbl) {
             var aboutus = $('#ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder1_divHearAboutUs');
             if ($(rbl).find('input:checked').val() == 'No') {
                 aboutus.show();
             }
             else {
                 aboutus.hide();
